tool_description: Quick and easy to use API for Real-Time financial data
name: EasyFinance
title: EasyFinance

api_list.name: Real-Time Cripto
api_list.description: Get live information of a criptocurrency
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://easyfinance.p.rapidapi.com/live/cripto/btc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easyfinance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://easyfinance.p.rapidapi.com/live/cripto/{criptocurrency}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easyfinance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Real-Time Stock
api_list.description: Get multiple information on real-time of a stock.

        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Real-Time Currency
api_list.description: Live information about a pair of currencies in real time
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://easyfinance.p.rapidapi.com/live/coin/usd/eur"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easyfinance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Real-Time Fund
api_list.description: Get real-time information of a fund. It is compatible with multiple markets.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://easyfinance.p.rapidapi.com/live/fund/VUSA^/NL"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easyfinance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://easyfinance.p.rapidapi.com/live/fund/{code}/{country}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easyfinance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
